snippet: Gordon Hayward scored 22 points and Derrick Favors had 21 points and 11 rebounds to help the Utah Jazz hold off the Milwaukee Bucks 96-87 Thursday night and claim consecutive wins for just the third time this season....

headline.print_headline: Hayward, Favors Lead Jazz Over Bucks 96-87
headline.main: Hayward, Favors Lead Jazz Over Bucks 96-87

lead_paragraph: Gordon Hayward scored 22 points and Derrick Favors had 21 points and 11 rebounds to help the Utah Jazz hold off the Milwaukee Bucks 96-87 Thursday night and claim consecutive wins for just the third time this season.
